remarks: The symbol at a given position in a concatenated word.  (Contributed by AV, 26-May-2018.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 24-Nov-2018.)
statement: ccatsymb $p |- ( ( A e. Word V /\ B e. Word V /\ I e. ZZ ) -> ( ( A concat B ) ` I ) = if ( I < ( # ` A ) , ( A ` I ) , ( B ` ( I - ( # ` A ) ) ) ) ) $.
